TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewDataItem extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的個別資料項目。

span.span: Represents an individual data item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示中的個別資料項目控制項。The class represents an individual data item in a control. 資料的項目通常會對應至資料來源物件中的記錄。A data item usually corresponds to a record in a data source object. 類別衍生自類別。The class derives from the class. 每個項目控制項具有指定之項目類型所表示之屬性。Each item in the control has a designated item type that is represented by the property. 當項目類型是，您可以使用類別，以取得詳細資訊的項目。When the item type is , you can use the class to get more information about the item. 控制項儲存資料中的項目集合。The control stores data items in the collection. 若要判斷索引物件存放至集合，使用屬性。To determine the index of a object in the collection, use the property. 若要判斷基礎資料來源中的資料項目的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the data item in the underlying data source, use the property. 這些索引內容之間的差異在於代表資料項目的位置，在目前頁面中，而頁面位移為基礎。The difference between these index properties is that represents the position of the data item in the current page, whereas is based on the page offset. 如果在未啟用分頁功能控制項使用控制項，這兩個屬性會包含相同的值。If the paging functionality is not enabled in the control by using a control, these two properties will contain the same value. 您可以使用來存取基礎資料物件的屬性屬性。You can access the properties of the underlying data object by using the property. 屬性時，可使用只在下列期間之後事件控制項。The property is available only during and after the event of a control. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件中的項目從擷取的欄位值控制項。The following example shows how to use a object to retrieve a field value from an item in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 取得或設定 物件所繫結的基礎資料物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying data object that the object is bound to.

value.span: 物件所繫結的基礎資料物件。

span.span: The underlying data object that the object is bound to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時，可使用只在下列期間之後事件控制項。The property is available only during and after the event of a control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以擷取欄位值。The following example shows how to use the property to retrieve a field value. 值，然後用來預先選取的項目項目處於編輯模式時顯示的控制項。The value is then used to pre-select an item in a control that is displayed when an item is in edit mode. 這個程式碼範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/CS/ListViewDataItemDataItemCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/VB/ListViewDataItemDataItemVB.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項中所顯示之資料項目的位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the data item as displayed in the control.

value.span: 控制項中所顯示資料項目之以零起始的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position of the data item as displayed in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至目前位置的項目，如下面的控制項。The property corresponds to the current position of the item as displayed by the control. 每個項目值會反映到特定的資料頁面中的控制項所加入的順序。Each item's value reflects the order in which they were added to the control in that particular page of data. 您可以使用屬性，以擷取物件存放至集合。You can use the property to retrieve a object in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料的項目。This property applies only to data items. 它不適用於插入項目或空白項目。It does not apply to insert items or empty items. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來擷取正在編輯之項目的索引。The following example shows how to use the property to retrieve the index of the item that is being edited. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/CS/ListViewUpdateItemCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/VB/ListViewUpdateItemVB.aspx#2)]
